person.persName: Judge Samuel Miller Breckenridge (St. Louis, MO judge)

body.p: Born in Baltimore, Maryland, son of the Rev. John Breckenridge, D.D. Educated at Central College, Kentucky, and Princeton University. Studied law at Transylvania University in Kentucky, and was admitted to the bar at age 18 (c. 1846). Practiced law in Lexington, Kentucky for two years. Went to St. Louis, Missouri in 1850. Elected to the Missouri state legislature in 1854. Elected Judge of the St. Louis Circuit Court in 1859. Member of the State Convention of Missouri which sat from 1861 to 1863.
